rows.label: qst660205_msg0001
rows.name:
I have been waiting
for someone like you.

rows.label: qst660205_msg0002
rows.name:
I am a battle bard... My duty is to
put memories of battle to song...

rows.label: qst660205_msg0003
rows.name:
Of course, I will reward
you. Would you share your
memories of battle with me?

rows.label: qst660205_msg0004
rows.name: Trade for an Accessory Expander Kit?

rows.label: qst660205_msg0102
rows.name:
You've been through battles of an
intensity I've never seen before.

rows.label: qst660205_msg0103
rows.name:
Please tell me more sometime.
I'll be waiting here.

rows.label: qst660205_msg0202
rows.name:
But I will wait forever... for
the time when you will tell me
your memories of battle...

rows.label: qst660205_msg0301
rows.name:
I would love to hear more of
your memories of battle, but...

rows.label: qst660205_msg0302
rows.name: I have run out of rewards to give you.
